name: Santos Merino
body: Santos Merino (@santitox) received the B.Sc./M.Sc. degree in computer engineering from University of Cantabria, Spain, in 2013. After working for Philips Research in the fields of embedded software and lightweight cryptography, he is now a Ph.D. student at the Crypto Group, Universit√© catholique de Louvain. His research interests include the areas of side-channel attacks, countermeasures and efficient software and hardware implementations of cryptographic algorithms. In his spare time he enjoys reverse engineering, Capture the Flag (CTF) competitions, photography and hanging out with his family.
